creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Dr and Mrs Marvin Gordon
description: grapevine branches enter at center L, angling downward towards LR; two clusters of grapes at R among a few leaves and curling vines
markings: top center of dowel, in ink: [Chikuto Grapes]; LLQ, at edge: square intaglio: [Seisho no In]; 2, square relief: [Chikuto no in]
title: Grapes
